pinyin: zài qǔǐ qǔǐ yī qián
translation: In the very long time ago.

breakdown.meaning: at, in; within (在 = at/in, 时间 = time)
before, in the past (以 = with, 前 = front)

pinyin: yóu yī ge xiǎzhōng
translation: There is a small village.

breakdown.meaning: small village (小 = small, 村 = village, 庄 = settlement/hamlet)

chinese: 村民们过着宁静的生活
pinyin: Cūnmínmen gù zhíng de shēnghuó
translation: The villagers are living a quiet life.

breakdown.meaning: the villagers (村 = village, 民 = people)
to live (过 = to live, 着 = in a state of)
a quiet life (宁静 = quiet, 生活 = life)

pinyin: mǐtiánrìchūérzuò
translation: Every day at sunrise, he begins work.

breakdown.meaning: every day (每 = every, 天 = day)
sunrise (日 = sun, 出 = exit/come out)
to begin work (而 = while, 作 = to do/to make)

pinyin: rìlù é xì
translation: The sun sets and he falls asleep.

pinyin: yǒu tiān
translation: One day

chinese: 村里的一个年轻人叫李明
pinyin: Cūn de yī ge qīng rén jiāo Lǐ Míng
translation: A young man from the village is named Li Ming.

breakdown.meaning: young man (年 = year, 轻 = light)
Li Ming (李 = Li, 明 = bright)

chinese: 他是个勇敢而好奇的人
pinyin: tā shì jiǎo yǒnghuó ér hàoqí de rén
translation: He is a brave and curious person.

breakdown.meaning: bold, courageous (勇 = brave, 冠 = crown)
curious, inquisitive (好 = love/like, 奇 = strange/new)

pinyin: tā tīnguó zài shān de lǐ mian bĕi
translation: He heard that there is a mountain on the other side.

breakdown.meaning: to hear/say (听 = to hear, 说 = to say)
on the other side of the mountains (山 = mountain, 边 = side)

chinese: 有一座传说中的神秘湖泊
pinyin: yǒu yīzuò shén mì zhongshèng húbó
translation: There is a legendary mysterious lake.

breakdown.meaning: one lake (一 = one, 座 = seat/dock)
(传说 = legend, 中 = middle/China, 传 = spread, 中 = middle/China) a legendary place in China.
(神秘 = mysterious, 湖泊 = lake/sit of water) a mysterious lake in China.

pinyin: Hú shuǐ qīng chéng jiàn dì
translation: The clear water shows the bottom.

pinyin: Néngeróng yìng cháo shǒu rén de xīn líng
translation: Mirror can reflect people's hearts and spirits.

breakdown.meaning: able/can (能 = able, 么 = question particle)
people's hearts and spirits (人 = person, 心 = heart/mind, 灵 = spirit)

pinyin: Juéshuó
translation: According to what is said.

breakdown.meaning: according to, based on (据 = according to/based on)
to say, to state (说 = to say/to state)

pinyin: yǒu dé nèi xīn chún jìng de rén
translation: Only those who have a pure and inner heart.

breakdown.meaning: inner heart (内 = inner, 心 = heart/mind)
pure, clean (纯 = pure, 净 = clean)

chinese: 才能在湖水中看到自己的未来
pinyin: Cái néng zai hú shuǐ zhong guó zi jien de wèi lüe
translation: Only then can you see your future in the lake.

breakdown.meaning: in the lake (湖 = lake, 水 = water)
your future (自己的 = your, 未来 = future)

pinyin: Tā bēi xíng cáng
translation: He is carrying his backpack and luggage.

breakdown.meaning: going, journey (可以表示‘去’的动作，作为动词时意为‘to go’)}

pinyin: shuǐ
translation: water

chinese: 踏上了这次未知的旅程
pinyin: tàshàng shízé bùzhī de lǜjñg
translation: Embraced this unknown journey.

breakdown.meaning: to step on, tread (踏 = step, 上 = up)
on, upon, to step on (上 = up/on)
unknown, uncertain (未 = not, 知 = know)
journey, trip (旅 = travel, 程 = journey/step)

pinyin: tā chuán yuè le mǎo shǜ de sēnlin
translation: The man crossed through the dense forest.

pinyin: Guóqù le tàngǔ de héyú.
translation: They successfully crossed the rushing river.

breakdown.meaning: to cross over (过 = to cross, 典型表示动作的完成)
completed, indicating the action is done (语末粒子，用于表示完成)
rushing, rushing river (湍 = rushing, 急 = urgency)
of, used to indicate possession or description (定语助词)

chinese: 一路上遇到了许多困难
pinyin: yīlù shàng Yu dào le xǔduō kùnnán
translation: On the way, he encountered many difficulties.

breakdown.meaning: Along the way (一 = one, 路 = road, 上 = above)
encountered (遇 = to meet, 道 = road, 了 = past tense marker)

pinyin: Dù tā cóng bù pào guó
translation: But he has never given up.

breakdown.meaning: never (从 = from, 未 = not yet)

chinese: 因为他相信这个湖泊一定存在
pinyin: Yīnwei tā xiāngxìn gējié hú kù yán zhiyóu cūn shì。
translation: Because he believes this lake definitely exists.

breakdown.meaning: definitely exists (yán = definitely, cūn shì = exists)

pinyin: jǐ-tián-hòu
translation: A few days later.

breakdown.meaning: few (几 = a small number of, 代表‘少’的量词)

chinese: 他来到一座陡峭的山脚下
pinyin: tā lái dào yī zuò dǔ xiǎo de shān jiǐ zǐ
translation: He arrived at the foot of a steep mountain.

breakdown.meaning: steep, precipitous (陡 = steep, 峰 = peak)
at the foot of the mountain

pinyin: Shān shàng mǎn shí dǔ jié de shí
translation: The mountain is filled with steep rocks.

breakdown.meaning: steep, rugged (陡 = steep, 峰 = peak)

chinese: 通往山顶的路险峻无比
pinyin: tōngwǎi shānzǐ de lù hán jiǔ wú bǐ
translation: The road leading to the mountain peak is extremely dangerous.

breakdown.meaning: mountain peak (山 = mountain, 顶 = top)

pinyin: ràn ér nü
translation: However (However is often used to express a change in tone or direction in a sentence)

breakdown.meaning: but (used at the beginning of a sentence to indicate contrast)
but, and (used to show contrast or connection in ideas)
a particle used at the end of a sentence to express doubt or agreement

pinyin: Hé yǎ jǐn yà.
translation: Clenching his teeth.

pinyin: yībù yībù de dì shàng qīan bǎ
translation: Climbing one step at a time.

breakdown.meaning: step, pace (步 = step, 伐 = cut)
one step (一 = one, 步 = step)
ground, location (地 = ground/land, 迪 = to reach)
to climb (攀 = to climb, 爬 = to crawl)

pinyin: Zuìshèng
translation: Finally

breakdown.meaning: last, ultimate (最 = last, 末 = end)
end, final (末 = end, 末 also means final)
to terminate, to finish (终 = to conclude, 终 can also mean end)

pinyin: tā zhàn le shān dīng
translation: He stands at the top of the mountain.

breakdown.meaning: mountain top (山 = mountain, 顶 = peak)

chinese: 眼前的景象令他惊叹不已——那座神秘的湖泊真的存在！湖水宁静而澄澈
pinyin: yǎnfěn jiànxiàng lìng tā zhùng rao —— nà zé bùxué de húchǔ zhèng shí yǒn！hú shuǐ nìngjìng ér chéngchuàng
translation: The景象 before him struck him with amazement. The mysterious湖泊 truly exists! The water is calm and clear.

breakdown.meaning: before one's eyes (眼 = eye, 前 = in front)
the scene/situation (景 = landscape, 象 = appearance/figure)
to cause; to lead to (令 = to instruct/command, 令 here is auxiliary verb)
to exclaim; to marvel (惊 = astonished, 叹 = exclamation)
extremely; not at all (不 = not, 亦 = also)
that/this lake (那 = that, 座 = base/dwelling)
the mysterious one (神 = divine/god, 秘 = secret)
lake (湖 = lake, 佝 = irregular shape/depiction of a lake)
truly; really (真 = true, 实 = actual/fact)
exists! (存 = to exist, 在 = location, ! = exclamation mark)
lake water (湖 = lake, 水 = water)
calm and clear (宁 = calm, 静 = quiet, 澄 = clear, 澈 = to be clear)

pinyin: huán rú yī miàn jù dà jìngzi
translation: It reflects like a large mirror.

breakdown.meaning: Child; in compounds, can mean 'to reflect'

pinyin: tā huánhuǎng zǒu jìnnháng
translation: He walks slowly towards the lake shore.

breakdown.meaning: lake shore (湖 = lake, 边 = edge/shore)

chinese: 他看到自己的倒影发生了变化。
pinyin: tā kànjiàn zìjǐ de dào yĭng fásóng le zīyànɡ
translation: He noticed that his reflection has changed.

breakdown.meaning: to notice/see (看 = see, 见 = see)
his own (自 = self, 且 = and, iji = his)
reflection (倒 = upside down, 影 = shadow/reflection)
has changed (发生 = happen, 变化 = change)

chinese: 他看到了自己未来的模样——一个智慧而善良的长者
pinyin: tā kànle dào zǐjièe未来的模样——一个智慧而善良的长者
translation: He saw the image of his future self—a wise and kind old man.

breakdown.meaning: the appearance of oneself in the future (自 = self, 个人 = personal, 未来 = future)
an intelligent and kind old man (智 = wisdom, 悳 = kind, 长者 = elder)

chinese: 带领着村民们走向繁荣
pinyin: Bǐlíngzhe cūnmínmen zǒuqiang fánlùn
translation: Leading the villagers toward prosperity.

breakdown.meaning: to lead (带 = to carry/lead, 领 = leader)
used as an aspectual particle (助词用于语态修饰)
the villagers (村 = village, 民 = people)
toward the prosperous future (走 = to go, 向 = toward, 阜 = prosperous)

pinyin: Lǐ Míng Tǒn Shí Míng Liè
translation: Li Ming realized.

chinese: 这次旅程不仅是寻找湖泊。
pinyin: Zhé cì lǜchéng bù jǐr shì xúnzhǎo húbó.
translation: This journey is not merely for sightseeing; it's to find lakes.

breakdown.meaning: journey, trip (third tone for lǜ, first tone for chéng)
not merely, this is also (first tone for jǐ, fourth tone for shì)
to find lakes (first tone for xún, third tone for zhǎo, first tone for hú, fourth tone for bó)

pinyin: Gēěr zǒu xīng zhōng de nǎi hín
translation: Even more to seek one's inner self.

breakdown.meaning: to seek, to look for (索 = to seek, 反 = no)
inner self, one's inner heart (内 = inside, 心 = heart)

pinyin: tā bǐ zhi le mǎnmǎn de shōuguǒ
translation: He is bringing a full harvest.

pinyin: Dǒu shàng lì ru
translation: He has set out on his journey.

breakdown.meaning: to step or start a journey (踏 = step; ǒu = to step)
on, to get on (上 = on; shàng = to get on)
journey home or the way back (归 = return; 徙 = path)

pinyin: táng hé huí3 dào4 cūnzhāng shí
translation: Every time he returns to the village.

breakdown.meaning: when/this time (当 = when, 时 = time)
to return back (回 = return, 到 = back)

pinyin: Cūnmínmen yǔzǐ hé
translation: Villagers surround him.

breakdown.meaning: peasant, village resident (村 = village, 民 = citizen)

chinese: 想听他讲述这次神奇的经历
pinyin: xiǎngjīng tā lóu shì zhé shí qí de jīngqì
translation: I want to listen to him recount this remarkable experience.

breakdown.meaning: Want to listen (想 = want, 听 = to listen)
To recount (讲 = to tell, 处理 = processing; here refers to recounting)
This time/occasion (这 = this, 次 = time)
Wondrous experience (神奇 = wonderful/miraculous, 经历 = experience)

pinyin: Cónɡ nā yǐhóu
translation: From then on.

breakdown.meaning: from that point onward (从 = from, 该点以后 = from that point)
that (指示过去某个时间点的不确定指代词)
after that, subsequently (以 = with/indicating time continuation, 后 = after)

chinese: 带领大家共同建设更美好的家园
pinyin: dàochéng jiāmen gòngxiàn shēciang hóugōu jia yuan
translation: Lead everyone in jointly building a more beautiful homeland.

breakdown.meaning: to lead (带 = to carry, 领 = to lead)
a more beautiful homeland (好 = good, 美 = beautiful, 宗 = country/land, 园 = home/village)

pinyin: Shìguàng hẹnlǐ
translation: Time flies by quickly.

breakdown.meaning: time (with specific meaning of clock time)

pinyin: Suìyuè rú shé
translation: Time flows like a shuttle.

breakdown.meaning: weaver's shuttle (梭 = shuttle used in weaving)

pinyin: duō shí hòu
translation: One day later

breakdown.meaning: after, later; in the end (后 = after/later)

chinese: 李明真的成为了湖中倒影里的那个人
pinyin: Lǐmíng zhènlǜ chéngle húzhōng dòu yìng lǐ de nà rén
translation: Li Ming truly became the person reflected in the lake.

breakdown.meaning: Given name Ming, meaning bright or clear
Truly, really (真 = true, 么 = but)
Has become, achieved (成 = achieve, 了 = completed)
In the lake, reflecting in the lake
Reflections in the water, within the reflection

pinyin: Tā yòng zìjǐ de zhīhuí.
translation: He uses his own intelligence.

breakdown.meaning: his own (自 = self, 己 = oneself; 但 here is a particle indicating possession)
intelligence or wisdom (智 = intelligence, 感 = feeling)

pinyin: shánliáng
translation: Kindness

pinyin: Bǐlương cūnzhāng zǒu xiàng le fánhuán.
translation: Leading the village toward prosperity.

breakdown.meaning: to lead, to guide (把 = help, 领 = leadership)
toward, heading in the direction of (走 = walk/lead, 向 = toward)

pinyin: é nàzuǒ shénmǐ de húbó
translation: While there exists a mysterious lake, no one has ever seen it.

breakdown.meaning: that lake/that body of water (那 = that, 座 = lake/body of water)
mysterious lake/mysterious body of water (神秘 = mysterious, 湖泊 = lake/body of water)

chinese: 等待着下一个勇敢的旅人去探索
pinyin: Déiduì zhe ni hǎo yǒnggāi de lǜrén qù tànlù
translation: Waiting for the next brave traveler to explore.

breakdown.meaning: to wait (等 = to wait, 侍 = to attend)
(particle used to indicate aspect, here indicating a continuing action)
next (下 = down/next, 亟 = urgent; together meaning 'next' in this context)
traveler/traveling person (旅 = travel, 人 = person)
to explore (去 = to go, 探索 = exploration)

pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ Měitiān Xuézhongwén.
translation: Little Li learns Chinese every day.

breakdown.meaning: every day (每 = every, 天 = day)
to learn (学 = study, 习 = practice)
Chinese language (中 = middle/China, 文 = language/writing)
